title: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Yojana
description: A relief package providing financial assistance to women from economically weaker sections.

title: Mahila Shakti Kendra Scheme
description: An initiative that empowers women through skill development, capacity building, and awareness programs.

title: Women Helpline (181)
description: A helpline for women in distress, providing support and guidance.

title: One-Stop Centers (OSCs)
description: Centrally sponsored scheme to provide support and assistance to women affected by violence.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: A scheme that provides LPG connections to women from BPL households.

title: Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao (BBBP)
description: A campaign to promote the welfare and education of girls.
